meanings.definition: A straight line passing from side to side through the center of a circle or sphere.
meanings.sent1: The diameter of the circle was easy to measure.
meanings.sent2: The diameter of the sphere was twice the radius.
meanings.sent3: The diameter of the pizza was so large that it barely fit through the door.
meanings.sent4: The diameter of her smile could light up a room.
meanings.sent5: The diameter of the tree trunk was so wide that it took three people to hug it.

meanings.definition: The length of such a line.
meanings.sent1: He measured the diameter of the circle with a ruler.
meanings.sent2: The diameter of the pipe was crucial for the plumbing project.
meanings.sent3: The diameter of the sandwich was so huge that he struggled to take a bite.
meanings.sent4: The diameter of the canyon was awe-inspiring, stretching as far as the eye could see.
meanings.sent5: The diameter of the spider web was delicate yet perfectly symmetrical.
